recommendations.recommendation: Implement detailed event logging for user actions, cart operations, and payment processing.
Add comprehensive data-test attributes to all interactive elements and implement state monitoring APIs for better test visibility.
recommendations.aiReasoning: AI detected limited element observability and state capture capabilities. Adding test attributes will improve automated test reliability.

recommendations.recommendation: Expose more application state through data attributes, ARIA labels, or debug APIs. Make internal states and processes visible for testing.
recommendations.aiReasoning: AI analysis found limited visibility into application logic and state transitions. Transparency enables more reliable assertions.

recommendations.recommendation: Reduce dynamic content and async operations. Add loading indicators and stable element selectors to improve test reliability.
recommendations.aiReasoning: AI stability analysis detected frequent UI changes and timing issues. Stable selectors and predictable behavior reduce test flakiness.
